snippet: The police said Friday that they had arrested 29 people accused of being part of a cannibal cult and charged them with the murders of seven people suspected of being witch doctors.
abstract: Police in Papua New Guinea arrest 29 people accused of being part of a cannibal cult and charge them with the murders of seven people suspected of being witch doctors.
lead_paragraph: The police said Friday that they had arrested 29 people accused of being part of a cannibal cult and charged them with the murders of seven people suspected of being witch doctors.

headline.seo: Papua New Guinea: Grisly Accusations of Cannibalism
